game.name: Tokyo Xtreme Racer
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, HDR available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: "Tokyo Xtreme Racer" is a racing game set in a blocked-off future Tokyo, where players aim to be the fastest by driving their best cars on the highways that weave through the city.
